# GitHub Landing Page - Copilot Instructions

This workspace contains a modern, responsive GitHub-inspired landing page built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

## Quick Start

1. The development server is running at `http://localhost:8000`
2. Edit files directly in VS Code and refresh browser to see changes
3. Use the "Start Development Server" task to restart the server if needed

## Project Structure

- `index.html` - Main landing page
- `styles.css` - All styling and responsive design
- `script.js` - Interactive features and animations
- `README.md` - Complete project documentation

## Development Notes

- Fully responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop
- Smooth scroll animations using Intersection Observer API
- Modern CSS with custom properties for easy theming
- Accessible navigation with hamburger menu for mobile
- Performance optimized with vanilla JavaScript
